name: Video Control
msg: Provide audio descriptions or text alternatives for prerecorded media
heading: Provide Alternatives for Prerecorded Media Content
description: This ensures that users with visual or auditory impairments can access essential information in the media.

name: Volume Control
msg: Provide users control over audio content, including volume and playback
heading: Provide Controls for Automatically Playing Audio Longer Than 3 Seconds
description: This rule is essential to prevent interference with screen readers and to give users control over their audio experience.

name: Keyboard Control
msg: Provide users control over audio content, including volume and playback
heading: Ensure Keyboard-Only Focus Navigation with Clear Exit Methods
description: This rule is vital for users relying on keyboards, allowing them to navigate and exit components smoothly without requiring a mouse.

name: Unique Title
msg: Each page should have a unique and descriptive title
heading: Provide Descriptive Titles for Web Pages
description: This rule ensures that users can easily understand the topic or purpose of a page, enhancing navigation and usability.

name: Specified Language of Page
msg: Specify the language of the entire page
heading: Specify the Default Language of Each Web Page
description: This rule is crucial for accessibility, allowing assistive technologies to properly interpret and present content in the correct language.
